title: Acadmiac
content: Acadmiac​‍​‌‍​‍‌​‍​‌‍​‍‌ is committed to transforming study into a pleasurable and efficient activity. Every course at Acadmiac Institute is essentially aimed at deepening the student's grasp of the subject through crisp and clear explanations. Faculty members are always ready to offer the necessary support, and hence, students will be able to solidify their basics. Through regular revision, well-organized plans, and continuous practice, students become self-assured in their academic capabilities. The institute, through its various initiatives, inculcates the values of accountability, self-control, and continuous progress. title: Emojis not showing up/blank
content: Web pages that are supposed to contain emojis are blank. I can highlight where emojis are supposed to be shown but the actual images of the emojis aren't there. about:config font.name-list.emoji correctly contains "Apple Color Emoji" If it is relevant, this has been a bug/issue that has persisted for a couple of months now (can't name an exact date).
creator: mozzarellafirefox

title: Loss of Account
content:
Hi, I recently got some small virus on my computer, forcing me to delete my browsing data and my cookie permissions on ALL websites. Because of this unfortunate last resort, I have been logged out of everything I had an account with that was web-based. Now, luckily I have removed the virus and logged back into all my accounts for these webs, except for two- ChatGPT and Perplexity. Now, the reason I have came here to ask a question, is how I can recover my account. Although, and if so, it is that I have came to the wrong place for asking about these specific account recoveries, then I am very sorry. But with the loss of my two accounts, I have lost very important data and statistics about many things and It has came to the level of anxiety that I've had to come to Mozilla support for this type of account recovery. With an unlimited amount of "Please" I ask that you help me solve the problem, and get not only my accounts but my data back.

Thank you.
creator: vihanhurkadli987

title: Firefox blocks State of Arizona Request to Speak website I have used for years with a WARNING sign and I need to be able to use it asap!
content:
I can get into the AZLEG.com general website but their REQUEST TO SPEAK program within the AZLEG website cannot be accessed. It has a WARNING MAY NOT BE SECURE statement. I have read all your learn more stuff and still cannot get past the not secure label on the AZLEG.com site.

Is it Firefox that needs a new certificate, an upgrade, or what that is the problem, or is it the AZLEG system. We have very important work to do on that site. Yesterday I could get into the system, but today all day I cannot. Please advise. Shirley

title: Fejlkode: PR_CONNECT_RESET_ERROR
content:
den har startet med at skrive det Fejlkode: PR_CONNECT_RESET_ERROR

den skriver på alle sider Sikker forbindelse mislykkedes

Der opstod en fejl under forbindelsen til www.flightconnections.com. PR_CONNECT_RESET_ERROR

Fejlkode: PR_CONNECT_RESET_ERROR 

   Siden kunne ikke vises, da autenticiteten af de modtagne data ikke kunne bekræftes.    Kontakt ejerne af webstedet omkring dette problem.

jeg kan ikke engang sende dens fejlstop

Secure Connection Failed

An error occurred while connecting to www.flightconnections.com. PR_CONNECT_RESET_ERROR

Error Code: PR_CONNECT_RESET_ERROR

The page could not be displayed because the authenticity of the data received could not be verified. Please contact the website owners about this issue.

and it is on all pages I search
